snippet.title: Arex for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

TRS-80
TRS-80 CoCo


Game description:

Arex is an action-puzzle, in which the player controls the spaceship "Arex" and has to fill as much ground as possible, while trying to avoid 3 types of aliens.

There are 2 game areas:

Arena, which is the training area and Dungeon, which is the main game.


What I think:

Very unique, fun and .... though as nails!
